title: Israel receives body Hamas says is Gaza hostage
description: Before Monday, Hamas had handed over all living hostages and 12 out of 28 deceased hostages under a ceasefire.
content:
Hamas has handed over a body that it says is a hostage, the Israeli military has said.
The body was transported by the Red Cross to Israeli forces in Gaza, and has returned to Israel for formal identification.
Before Monday, Hamas had handed over all... [2363 chars]

title: University tuition fees in England to rise with inflation every year from 2026
description: Bridget Phillipson confirmed the plans for the next two years, with fees to increase automatically after that.
content:
9 hours ago
Branwen JeffreysEducation Editor
University tuition fees in England will increase every year in line with inflation from 2026 onwards, the government has announced.

title: Starmer’s grooming gang inquiry left in turmoil after two survivors quit panel
description: Fiona Goddard and Ellie-Ann Reynolds criticise handling of national inquiry, which is yet to appoint a chair
content:
Keir Starmer’s national grooming gang inquiry has been left in turmoil after two survivors resigned from its oversight panel and accused the Home Office and Labour of “contempt” and “political interference” before it has appointed a chair.

title: University tuition fees in England to rise with inflation from next year
description: The education secretary says maintenance loans will also rise in line with inflation, and undergraduate tuition fees will eventually be linked to university quality.
content:
Students are already acutely aware of the cost of going to university
Branwen Jeffreys
Education editor

title: Tory MP criticised after demanding legally settled families be deported
description: Katie Lam said move would make UK ‘culturally coherent’ and that a large number of people ‘need to go home’
content:
A Conservative MP tipped as a future party leader has been condemned for saying large numbers of legally settled families must be deported, in order to ensure the UK is mostly “culturally coherent”.
The Tory leader, Kemi Badenoch, has been urged to c... [2051 chars]
